DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect curcumin supplement metabolic factor hepatic fibrosis nonalcoholic fatty liver patient type 2 diabetes . Subjects participate 3 month , two group , randomize intervention , one group ( n=25 ) take 1.5g/d curcumin group ( n=25 ) take placebo compare difference outcomes two group .
DOC.brief_title: Curcumin Supplement Nonalcoholic Fatty Liver Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patient diagnose type 2 diabetes base ADA definition take oral antidiabetic drug ; CAP score > 263 . Taking kind antibiotic two week recruitment ; History alcohol consumption ; pregnancy lactation ; Professional athlete ; Other liver disease ( viral/etc ) ; High dose synthetic estrogen , methotrexate , amiodarone , steroid , chloroquine , immunosuppressive drug ; A history Cardiovascular disease ; Renal disease , Celiac disease , Cirrhosis ; History Upper GI surgery ; A history hypothyroidism Cushing 's syndrome ; History drug dependence ; Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥35 kg/m2 ; A restrictive diet weight change ≥ 5 kg 3months prior study ; Any change treatment oral hypoglycemic ; anti hypertensive antilipid agent study ; Use weight loss medication .
